properties.name: minio.endpoint
properties.description: MinIO 服务器端点 URL (例如: http://localhost:9000)

properties.name: minio.access-key
properties.description: MinIO 访问密钥,用于身份验证

properties.name: minio.secret-key
properties.description: MinIO 密钥,用于身份验证

properties.name: minio.bucket-name
properties.description: 默认的存储桶名称,用于存储文件

properties.name: zhipu.ai.api-key
properties.description: 智普AI API密钥,用于调用智普AI服务的身份验证

properties.name: zhipu.ai.model
properties.description: 智普AI模型名称 (例如: glm-4-flash, glm-4-plus)

properties.name: zhipu.ai.timeout
properties.description: 智普AI API请求超时时间 (单位: 秒)
